channel.title: Form_notcontent on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.
channel.description: Recent content in Form_notcontent on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.

item.title: video mashups
item.description: The inspiration comes from ARTE: https://www.arte.tv/fr/videos/RC-015330/propaganda/ (french) https://www.arte.tv/de/videos/RC-015330/moneypulation/ (german), and I talk about the format, not the content :) The idea is to create mashup videos, i.e. videos where the images are unrelated to the content but bring humor or a different perspective to what the voice off is saying. There is a lot of free to reuse videos available to do it. The strategy to make some is to first write a script for the voice off and then look for the videos.

item.title: advertisment video
item.description: Links to interesting advertisment videos: giving ideas http://www.culturepub.fr/videos/volkswagen-golf-kids-dreams/ we make future real (VW) https://twitter.com/culturepub/status/1014081590706819072
